SELECT sum(credit) FROM orderPay op,`order` o WHERE o.orderID = op.orderID AND o.stationID = #(stationID) AND (o.paymentType = 2 OR o.paymentType = 3) AND o.orderDate BETWEEN #(startDate) AND #(endDate)

SELECT sum(price) FROM coupon c,orderPay op,`order` o WHERE o.orderID = op.orderID AND op.couponID = c.couponID AND o.stationID = #(stationID) AND o.paymentType = 4 AND o.orderDate BETWEEN #(startDate) AND #(endDate)
